articles.author: Jorge Valero, Lyubov Pronina, Alberto Nardelli
articles.title: EU Targets Boeing, US Cars and Bourbon With €72 Billion List - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The European Union has finalized a second list of countermeasures to target US goods worth €72 billion ($84 billion), including Boeing Co. aircraft, automobiles and bourbon if it decides to retaliate as transatlantic trade tensions intensify.
articles.content: The European Union has finalized a second list of countermeasures to target US goods worth 72 billion ($84 billion), including Boeing Co. aircraft, automobiles and bourbon if it decides to retaliate … [+301 chars]
